data.title: Phebe (Perry) Hastings (1848-1911)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Compare DNA and explore genealogy for Phebe (Perry) Hastings born 1848 Quincy, Branch, Michigan, United States died 1911 Jackson Township, Steuben, Indiana, United States including ancestors + descendants + 1 genealogist comments + DNA connections + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:
Ancestors

[sibling(s) unknown]

Descendants

Profile last modified 20 May 2024 | Created 14 Mar 2021

This page has been accessed 95 times.

Biography

Phebe Perry was born about 1849 and appears in the 1850 census of Quincy, Branch, MI in the household of parents David Perry and wife Elizabeth [1] Note that she appears on the same page as her probable future husband Andrew Wilbur.

Phebe married Andrew Wilbur in 1867, soon after he returned from the Civil War. [2]

They had two children before she left Andrew including Cora.[3] who was adopted by the Murrays (neighbors). [4] and son Perry in 1869 .[5]

Phebe appears in the 1870 census of Quincy, Branch, MI in the household of her parents [6] along with the family of her brother Edward, and her probable son Perry Wilber age 1.

Phebe married second Eli Hastings on 3 Dec 1871 in Branch, MI [7]

A daughter Jennie Hastings was born in Bethel, Branch, MI noting birth on 8 Sep 1874 [8]

They apparently moved to Kearney County, NE by 1880 [9] with surname misread as 'Haslings' with family including:

Jenny Hastings dau age 5

Nathan Hastings son age 3

The 1900 census of Ovid, Branch, MI [10] lists her as 'Pheba Hastings', born Jan 1848, wife of Eli B Hastings, married in 1872 with chidren:

Nathan Hastings M 23

Louisa Hastings F 16

Note that birth states match for Phebe (Michigan) and her parents (New York) with other records. Also note that Quincy and Ovid MI are about 10 miles apart.

She died on 30 Jan 1911 in Jackson, Steuben, IN per Death Certificate on Ancestry [11] See Source linked on her profile in my tree (https://www.ancestry.com/family-tree/person/tree/119052369/person/192033649859/facts)

Research Notes

She may have also had a son named Charles Bodine, listed as a step-son on Eli's obit. Could it be Charles Wilbur b. 1870?

Sources

↑ "United States Census, 1850", , FamilySearch (https://www.familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:MF8Z-RYM : Sun Mar 10 03:13:24 UTC 2024), Entry for David Perry and Elizabeth Perry, 1850.

↑ "Michigan Marriages, 1822-1995", , FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:FCK5-4Z7 : 17 January 2020), Phebe Perry in entry for Andrew E. Wilber, 1867.

↑ "Michigan, County Births, 1867-1917", , FamilySearch (https://www.familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:QGTM-Q7HC : Sat Mar 09 01:06:26 UTC 2024), Entry for Cora Wilber and Andrew Wilber, 8 Jul 1867.

↑ Unsourced family history document by Arthur L Smith who had known Cora notes "She [Phebe] ran away"

↑ "Michigan Births and Christenings, 1775-1995", , FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:F4BZ-M23 : 16 January 2020), Phebe Wilber in entry for Perrcy Wilber, 1869.

↑ "United States Census, 1870", , FamilySearch (https://www.familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:MHHD-XTP : Tue Mar 05 08:53:19 UTC 2024), Entry for David Perry and Betsey Perry, 1870.

↑ "Michigan Marriages, 1822-1995", database, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:FCKP-7PF : 17 January 2020), Pheba Perry in entry for Elia B. Hastings, 1871.

↑ ""Michigan, County Births, 1867-1917", , FamilySearch (https://www.familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:QGLJ-VXDN : Sat Mar 09 11:27:52 UTC 2024), Entry for Jennie Hastings and Eli B Hastings, 8 Sep 1874.

↑ "United States Census, 1880", , FamilySearch (https://www.familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:M8YX-TSH : Thu Mar 07 21:53:28 UTC 2024), Entry for Ely Haslings and Pheby Haslings, 1880.

↑ "United States Census, 1900", , FamilySearch (https://www.familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:M91P-N9B : Thu Apr 11 21:07:00 UTC 2024), Entry for Eli B Hastings and Pheba Hastings, 1900.

↑ Indiana Archives and Records Administration; Indianapolis, IN, USA; Death Certificates; Year: 1911; Roll: 11 (page 206) Ancestry.com. Indiana, U.S., Death Certificates, 1899-2011 [database on-line]. Lehi, UT, USA: Ancestry.com Operations, Inc., 2015.
